channel.title: Login message [delta]
channel.description:
Anny way to let a message say to all : (name) has logged in.
And also one for logging out.

item.title: Login message [delta]
item.dc:creator: @i_str_pk_i i str pk i
item.description:
@i_str_pk_i wrote:

[quote=“3lv3n snip3r, post:14, topic:391349”]I have it on my delta, i put it where u put the welcome message.

Your welcome message is below this:

l33thax(12323); l33thax(7574); l33thax(7599); l33thax(7549); l33thax(8493); l33thax(7499);

It should already have something there, but heres an example:

welcomeScreen(); if(donator >= 1 && playerRights == 0){ yell("[Donator] "+playerName+" has just logged on!"); } if(playerRights == 1){ yell("[Moderator] "+playerName+" has just logged on!"); } if(playerRights == 2){ yell("[Admin] "+playerName+" has just logged on!"); } if(playerRights == 3){ yell("[Owner] "+playerName+" has just logged on!"); } sM("Welcome to ServerName: "+playerName+"! Have Fun!"); if(donator >= 1){ sM("You are a Donator."); }

And your result is:

[Owner] 3lv3n Snip3r has just logged on. Welcome to ServerName: 3lv3n Snip3r! Have fun! You are a Donator.

Now, the donator part is only if you are a donator.
It will only say you logged in if you are staff or a donator.[/quote]mmmmm… i got this error :

./src/client.java:9834:cannot find symbol symbol : method welcomeScreen() welcomescreen(); ^ 1error

Read full topic

item.title: Login message [delta]
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

I have it on my delta, i put it where u put the welcome message.

Your welcome message is below this:

l33thax(12323); l33thax(7574); l33thax(7599); l33thax(7549); l33thax(8493); l33thax(7499);

It should already have something there, but heres an example:

welcomeScreen(); if(donator >= 1 && playerRights == 0){ yell("[Donator] "+playerName+" has just logged on!"); } if(playerRights == 1){ yell("[Moderator] "+playerName+" has just logged on!"); } if(playerRights == 2){ yell("[Admin] "+playerName+" has just logged on!"); } if(playerRights == 3){ yell("[Owner] "+playerName+" has just logged on!"); } sM("Welcome to ServerName: "+playerName+"! Have Fun!"); if(donator >= 1){ sM("You are a Donator."); }

And your result is:

[Owner] 3lv3n Snip3r has just logged on. Welcome to ServerName: 3lv3n Snip3r! Have fun! You are a Donator.

Now, the donator part is only if you are a donator.
It will only say you logged in if you are staff or a donator.

Read full topic

       talk(+ playerName + " has logged in.");
